誰料.definition: who would have thought that; who would have expected that

誰知道.definition: God knows...; Who would have imagined...?

誰笑到最後，誰笑得最好.pinyin: shei2 xiao4 dao4 zui4 hou4 , shei2 xiao4 de2 zui4 hao3
誰笑到最後，誰笑得最好.definition: He laughs best who laughs last.
